title: Cygnus X-3: A variable petaelectronvolt gamma-ray source
summary: We report the discovery of variable $γ$-rays up to petaelectronvolt from Cygnus X-3, an iconic X-ray binary. The $γ$-ray signal was detected with a statistical significance of approximately 10 $σ$ by the Large High Altitude Air Shower Observatory (LHAASO).
